name: Kymbo's Gold
flavorText: The great merchant Abd al-Kymbo commissioned this amulet, believing that health and wealth should be synonymous. Alas, he did not realize how much time he would spend on his knees picking up single coins, and soon abandoned the practice.
flavorTextHtml: The great merchant Abd al-Kymbo commissioned this amulet, believing that health and wealth should be synonymous. Alas, he did not realize how much time he would spend on his knees picking up single coins, and soon abandoned the practice.

secondary.textHtml: Picking up gold heals you for an amount equal to the gold that was picked up.
secondary.text: Picking up gold heals you for an amount equal to the gold that was picked up.

oneOf.textHtml: +[75 - 100]% Extra Gold from Monsters
